titles.title: IMPROVE Safety for Schools Act
IMPROVE Safety for Schools Act
Incentivize Motivated Parents with Responsible Options for Vital Education Safety for Schools Act
To encourage local educational agencies to inform parents about gun safety, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committees on the Judiciary, and Education and Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
